sub_topic: Predicting the solubility of inorganic salts in water
message_1: Determine the solubility of potassium nitrate (KNO3) in water at 25°C, given that its Ksp value is 74.55 g/L.
message_2: The solubility of potassium nitrate (KNO₃) in water at 25°C is already given as 74.55 g/L. This means that at 25°C, 74.55 grams of KNO₃ can dissolve in 1 liter of water to form a saturated solution.
